chatbot.title: 3. AI Research Chatbot
chatbot.description: Your intelligent assistant for data-driven policy analysis.
instructions: Click the floating "AI" button (bottom-right) to open chatbot.
Type @ + dataset name to attach datasets as research context.
Upload files (PDF, Word, Excel, CSV) for deeper analysis.
Ask policy questions like: "Compare renewable energy policies in Peru."
Focus analyses on regions, e.g., "Analyze electrification in Arequipa."
chatbot.capabilities: Policy analysis, stakeholder mapping, cost-benefit evaluation, data interpretation, and geographic insights.

reports.title: 4. Report Generation
reports.subtitle: How to Create Reports
steps: Click the REPORT menu on the header.
The AI generates a professional, 8-section report.
Review and download it in PDF or Word format.
reports.includes: Executive summary, coverage analysis, social impact, policy barriers, stakeholder mapping, prioritization table, and references.
reports.note: Reports are optimized for professional presentation and policy documentation.

footer.tip: Tip: Use @datasets and upload documents for more accurate AI insights.
